title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: In an upset, for the first time ... elected ahead of Stefano Bonaccini. In doing so, she became the PD's first female, as well as the youngest person, to be elected leader of the PD since the formation of the party in 2007....

title: Elly Schlein facts for kids
snippet: Elena Ethel "Elly" Schlein (born 4 May 1985) is an Italian politician. She has been the leader, or "secretary," of the Democratic Party (PD) since March 12, 2023.

title: Biography - Elly Schlein
snippet: Elly tours Italy with 70 stops in just a few months, alongside Pippo Civati and Civati supporters in his campaign for the leadership of the Democratic Party. She is full of enthusiasm: she really wants to reform the party to change her country. She is later elected to the party’s national ...

title: Meet the anti-Renzi: Elly Schlein becomes first woman leader of Italy’s center left
snippet: Schlein becomes the youngest leader and first woman at the helm of the PD, and is seen by supporters as a breath of fresh air for the party — historically dominated by middle-aged men — while critics point out that her unabashedly left-wing ...

title: Schlein's message to Conte: "The Democratic Party is the pivot of the alliance, I am everyone's secretary"
snippet: And maybe who knows: the secretary publicly thanked “the president Stefano Bonaccini”. At the congress Bonaccini challenged her for the secretariat, but then held a line of dialogue: “Unity cannot be achieved alone”, she Schlein underlined. Before her, Speranza spoke for Articolo Uno, Michela Di Biase, deputy and wife of Franceschini, for AreaDems, and Peppe Provenzano for Dems. “It’s not the statute of the Democratic Party – said Provenzano – but it’s politics that dictates who leads” the centre-left coalition. “Elly is your guide – Speranza reiterated – our militants, the people, the results said so.” And Di Biase, to avoid any misunderstanding: «Let’s not waste time in exhausting debates.
